solution_line_template: First find how many liters of the seawater are salt: {seawater_liters} liters * {salt_percent}% = <<{seawater_liters}*{salt_percent}*{percent_factor}={salt_liters}>>{salt_liters} liters

Then multiply that amount by {ml_per_liter} ml/liter to find the number of ml of salt Jack gets: {salt_liters} liters * {ml_per_liter} ml/liter = <<{salt_liters}*{ml_per_liter}={salt_ml}>>{salt_ml} ml
